item.title: Keyboard shortcuts in Aamu.app
item.description:
There are certain shortcuts that are very useful in Aamu.app, as they work almost everywhere, in a unified fashion.

One of them is n, which creates a new task, anywhere you are.

Another is c, which creates new item, item type being determined where you are in the app at the moment. For example, if you are in Emails, c will compose a new email.

Almost every type of item has a comment section. Pressing r will create a new reply (or a new comment) in the comment section.
